body.name: HP 2023 Latest Pavilion Business Laptop, 15.6" FHD Touchscreen, 13th Gen Intel Core i7-1355U, 32GB RAM, 1TB PCIe SSD, Webcam, FP Reader, Backlit KB, Wi-Fi 6, Windows 11 Pro, Silver
features: 【Memory & Storage】The PC memory has been upgraded to 32GB DDR4 SDRAM for enhanced high bandwidth to easily switch back and forth between open applications; Hard drive has been upgraded to 1TB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD for fast boot up and speedy data transfer
【Processor】 Intel Core i7-1355U Processor (10 Cores, 12 Threads, 12MB L3 Cache, Base Frequency at 1.20GHz, Up to 5.0GHz at Max Turbo Frequency) with Intel Iris Xe Graphics
【Screen】15.6" diagonal, FHD (1920 x 1080) Touchscreen, IPS, micro-edge, anti-glare, 250 nits
【Tech Specs】1 x USB 3.0 Type-C, 2 x USB 3.0 Type-A, 1 x HDMI, 1 x Headphone/Mic Combo, 1 x AC Power; Backlit Keyboard; Fingerprint Reader; Wi-Fi 6 & Bluetooth
【Windows 11 Pro】Organize open apps with pre-configured layouts to optimize productivity, Navigate with more intuitive experience to get things done, Collaborate with teams with more features
body.description: Key Features and Benefits:CPU: 13th Gen Intel Core i7-1355U Processor (10 Cores, 12 Threads, 12MB L3 Cache, Base Frequency at 1.20GHz, Up to 5.0GHz at Max Turbo Frequency)Graphics: Intel Iris Xe GraphicsMemory: Up to 64GB DDR4 RAMHard Drive: Up to 4TB PCIe NVMe M.2 Solid State DriveOperating System: Windows 11 ProDisplay: 15.6" diagonal, FHD (1920 x 1080) Touchscreen, IPS, micro-edge, anti-glare, 250 nitsBacklit Keyboard: Yes (F11)Fingerprint Reader: YesNumeric Keyboard: YesPorts:1 x USB 3.0 Type-C2 x USB 3.0 Type-A1 x HDMI1 x Headphone/Mic Combo1 x AC PowerOptical Drive: NoWebcam: HP Wide Vision 720p HD camera with temporal noise reduction and integrated dual array digital microphonesWireless Connectivity: Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth ComboDimensions: 14.18" x 9.21" x 0.7"Weight: 3.86 lbColor: Silver

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like this computer -- a whole lot!
reviews.reviewText: I like the computer -- a whole lot! It's got double the storage and double the RAM compared with my 5-year-old one, and a nice fast processor. Because the drive is solid-state, it boots up in mere seconds. And it got here when they said it would, so no problem there, either. I haven't tried the tech support, so I can't comment on that.But...I'm not completely onboard with Windows 11, though: there were things I could do on Windows 10 that are not possible on 11 (having each active task show up as a separate button on the taskbar, for instance). But I can't blame that on HP, or on Computer Upgrade King. So, yeah, I give the computer 5 stars.>>> And now, a little update (a couple of months later) about an update: Apparently I wasn't the only one who wasn't thrilled with how Windows 11 was displaying buttons on the taskbar. Windows did an update, and the update solved the problem. So now I like the computer (still a whole lot!) and I'm fine with Windows 11 too. Count me a happy camper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I purchased this, I realized, not only was I purchasing the HP laptop (my last HP worked for many years so it was my choice of brand) but I was also paying for someone to upgrade it, which left room for errors. I was very pleased with the specifications offered as it was exactly what I wanted, but was a little nervous to order based on some of the comments in the review. The checklist that was included with the laptop from the tech who worked on it and the manager who approved the work, helped to calm my concerns about the quality of the work on the upgraded components I requested. The setup went smoothly, and the laptop is working perfectly. It has only been a few days, and so far so good! It is amazing how other reviews can make you hesitate to purchase something, and I am someone who reads all of the reviews before I purchase. I'm very happy with my laptop so far. Pretty close to perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Set Up
reviews.reviewText: Practically sets itself up using Office Outlook for email. Super-fast browsing with high resolution big screen for watching movies. Keyboard lettering could be better if larger characters with better contrast. If you hunt and peck the light needs to be strong. Keyboard is not backlit. Also does not come with a disc drive for DVDs or music discs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Good value, not the best, but for the money, very good. I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars received defective laptop
reviews.reviewText: buy on 12/31/2023,...received defective laptop 1/8/2024,return on 1/12/2024............open amazon claim 01/23/2024 ,.....finally got money back on 2/6/2024

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Great laptop except for bluetooth.
reviews.reviewText: Excellent and fast laptop with 32gb ram and 1tb ssd. The biggest issue is very poor bluetooth connectivity. Even within 6 feet all my audio bluetooth devices have frequent drop outs and difficulties making connection. These devices work fine with my older HP Pavilion laptop. Often laptop will indicate that the bluetooth audio device is connected but audio still comes through the speakers. HP support made sure laptop had the latest drivers and still could not fix the issue. Don't buy this laptop if you plan on using the bluetooth feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This machine under preforms on battery, will only work 3-4 hours and the bottom of unit gets hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works just like described. Uber happy with the product. However, I've only had it a couple days.
reviews.reviewText: I like the easy of use. I love the touchscreen. I love the ways the keys feel while typing. Loved the price for it during Amazon Prime Days. Love the ten key. Just plain love it thus far. Fingers crossed it continues.
